        Returns the number of items that can be given to the inventory safely.
        Parameters:
        inv - The inventory to count
        item - The item prototype. Material, durabiltiy and enchants must match for 'stackability' to occur.
        Returns:
        The number of items that can be given to the inventory safely.

      • lookAt

        public static org.bukkit.Location lookAt​(org.bukkit.Location loc,
                                         org.bukkit.Location lookat)
        Returns loc with modified pitch/yaw angles so it faces lookat
        Parameters:
        loc - The location a players head is
        lookat - The location they should be looking
        Returns:
        The location the player should be facing to have their crosshairs on the location lookAt Kudos to bergerkiller for most of this function
